text: Learning Objectives • Describe linear regression and fit linear models to observed data • Build equations for simple linear regression and multiple regression • Calculate and interpret standard error of the estimate (sy|x) • Contrast r, r2, R, and R2 1 Regression is making predictions • How does Youtube decide what video to show next? • How does Netflix know how well I’ll like a movie I’ve never seen? • What is machine learning? Answer: Regression, regression, regression! 23 Predictor 1: Gender = Male Predictor 2: Age = 39 Predictor 3: Gave “Band of Brothers” 5 stars Criterion: Attitude toward USS Indianapolis Movie Path diagram of multiple regression Relationship X 1 Y Relationship X 3Y Relationship X2Y How grumpy is Dr. Dan? 4 Simple regression • Criterion (Y): Self-reported grumpiness on 0-100 scale • Predictor (X): Self-reported hours of sleep 5 • Line of best fit is a model that minimizes prediction errors for Y (‘criterion’ or ‘predicted’ variable) – Balances the magnitude of positive and negative errors • What model is this similar to? – Minimizes Σ(Y – Y’)2: Least squares regression line Σ	 2 + 2 + 2 + 2 + 2 Line of Best Fit = Regression Line Formula for linear regression line: Y’ = bYX + aY Y’ = Criterion variable (’ =predicted; Grumpiness) X = Predictor variable (hrs of sleep) bY = Slope of regression line aY = intercept (when sleep = 0, how is Dan?) 6 Line of Best Fit = Regression Line 𝑌! = 𝑏"𝑋 + 𝑎" 𝑌! = -8.94(X) + 125.96 • How do we calculate the regression line? 7 40 50 60 70 80 90 56 78 9 dan.sleepdan.grump Calculating Slope, bY Formula 1: Simple, when you know r, sY, and sX bY = r !! !"
